text: Sabse pehle, Shopify ki website pe jayen aur free account ke liye sign up karein. Apna email address aur password daalin aur 'Start Free Trial' pe click karein.  Pakistan select karein agar aap Pakistan mein hain.

Ab apne store ko customize karne ka waqt hai!  Shopify aapko bohat sari free themes deta hai. Apni pasand ki theme select karein aur us mein apni products, logo aur brand colors add karein.  Is step mein apna store attractive banayen.

Ab apka store ready hai launch hone ke liye!  Shopify ke saare features explore karein aur apni products add karein.  Apne store ko social media pe share karein aur apne customers ko attract karein.  Yaad rakhen, yeh sirf teen din ke liye free hai, phir aapko ek plan choose karna hoga.

Iske baad aap apne payment methods add kar sakte hain, apne products ko organize kar sakte hain aur apne store ko aur bhi zyada professional bana sakte hain.  Agar aapko kisi bhi step mein help chahiye to humein DM karein! Hum aapki madad karenge.
